verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

If a soul <WH5315> sin <WH2398> <WH8799>, and commit <WH4603> <WH8804> a trespass <WH4604> against the YY <WH3068>, and lie <WH3584> <WH8765> unto his neighbour <WH5997> in that which was delivered <WH6487> him to keep, or in fellowship <WH8667> <WH3027>, or in a thing taken away by violence <WH1498>, or hath deceived <WH6231> <WH8804> his neighbour <WH5997>;

Or have found <WH4672> <WH8804> that which was lost <WH9>, and lieth <WH3584> <WH8765> concerning it, and sweareth <WH7650> <WH8738> falsely <WH8267>; in any <WH259> of all these that a man <WH120> doeth <WH6213> <WH8799>, sinning <WH2398> <WH8800> therein <WH2007>:

Then it shall be, because he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8799>, and is guilty <WH816> <WH8804>, that he shall restore <WH7725> <WH8689> that <WH1500> which he took violently away <WH1497> <WH8804>, or the thing <WH6233> which he hath deceitfully gotten <WH6231> <WH8804>, or that which was delivered <WH6487> <WH853> him to keep <WH6485> <WH8717>, or the lost thing <WH9> which he found <WH4672> <WH8804>,

Or all that about which he hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8735> falsely <WH8267>; he shall even restore <WH7999> <WH8765> it in the principal <WH7218>, and shall add <WH3254> the fifth part <WH2549> more <WH3254> <WH8686> thereto, and give <WH5414> <WH8799> it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day <WH3117> of his trespass offering <WH819>.

And he shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> his trespass offering <WH817> unto the YY <WH3068>, a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> out of the flock <WH6629>, with thy estimation <WH6187>, for a trespass offering <WH817>, unto the Kohen <WH3548>:

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for him before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> him for any thing <WH259> of all that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8799> in trespassing <WH819> therein.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Command <WH6680> <WH8761> Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the Torah <WH8451> of the burnt offering <WH5930>: It is the burnt offering <WH5930>, because of the burning <WH4169> upon the altar <WH4196> all night <WH3915> unto the morning <WH1242>, and the fire <WH784> of the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> <WH8714> in it.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall put <WH3847> <WH8804> on his linen <WH906> garment <WH4055>, and his linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> shall he put <WH3847> <WH8799> upon his flesh <WH1320>, and take up <WH7311> <WH8689> the ashes <WH1880> which the fire <WH784> hath consumed <WH398> <WH8799> with the burnt offering <WH5930> on the altar <WH4196>, and he shall put <WH7760> <WH8804> them beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall put off <WH6584> <WH8804> his garments <WH899>, and put on <WH3847> <WH8804> other <WH312> garments <WH899>, and carry forth <WH3318> <WH8689> the ashes <WH1880> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> unto a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>.

And the fire <WH784> upon the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> <WH8714> in it; it shall not be put out <WH3518> <WH8799>: and the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH1197> <WH8765> wood <WH6086> on it every morning <WH1242>, and lay the burnt offering <WH5930> in order <WH6186> <WH8804> upon it; and he shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> thereon the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings <WH8002>.
The fire <WH784> shall ever <WH8548> be burning <WH3344> <WH8714> upon the altar <WH4196>; it shall never go out <WH3518> <WH8799>.
And this is the Torah <WH8451> of the meat offering <WH4503>: the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> shall offer <WH7126> <WH8685> it before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall take <WH7311> <WH8689> of it his handful <WH7062>, of the flour <WH5560> of the meat offering <WH4503>, and of the oil <WH8081> thereof, and all the frankincense <WH3828> which is upon the meat offering <WH4503>, and shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> it upon the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, even the memorial <WH234> of it, unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the remainder <WH3498> <WH8737> thereof shall Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> eat <WH398> <WH8799>: with matzah <WH4682> shall it be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>; in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it.

It shall not be baken <WH644> <WH8735> with leaven <WH2557>. I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> it unto them for their portion <WH2506> of my offerings made by fire <WH801>; it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>, as is the sin offering <WH2403>, and as the trespass offering <WH817>.

All the males <WH2145> among the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it. It shall be a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> in your generations <WH1755> concerning the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>: every one that toucheth <WH5060> <WH8799> them shall be holy <WH6942> <WH8799>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

This is the offering <WH7133> of Aharon <WH175> and of his sons <WH1121>, which they shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when he is anointed <WH4886> <WH8736>; the tenth part <WH6224> of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503> perpetual <WH8548>, half <WH4276> of it in the morning <WH1242>, and half <WH4276> thereof at night <WH6153>.

In a pan <WH4227> it shall be made <WH6213> <WH8735> with oil <WH8081>; and when it is baken <WH7246> <WH8716>, thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> it in: and the baken <WH8601> pieces <WH6595> of the meat offering <WH4503> shalt thou offer <WH7126> <WH8686> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> of his sons <WH1121> that is anointed <WH4899> in his stead shall offer <WH6213> <WH8799> it: it is a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> unto the YY <WH3068>; it shall be wholly <WH3632> burnt <WH6999> <WH8714>.
For every meat offering <WH4503> for the Kohen <WH3548> shall be wholly burnt <WH3632>: it shall not be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto Aharon <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the Torah <WH8451> of the sin offering <WH2403>: In the place <WH4725> where the burnt offering <WH5930> is killed <WH7819> <WH8735> shall the sin offering <WH2403> be killed <WH7819> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

The Kohen <WH3548> that offereth it for sin <WH2398> <WH8764> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it: in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725> shall it be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

Whatsoever shall touch <WH5060> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> thereof shall be holy <WH6942> <WH8799>: and when there is sprinkled <WH5137> <WH8799> of the blood <WH1818> thereof upon any garment <WH899>, thou shalt wash <WH3526> <WH8762> that whereon it was sprinkled <WH5137> <WH8799> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>.

But the earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627> wherein it is sodden <WH1310> <WH8792> shall be broken <WH7665> <WH8735>: and if it be sodden <WH1310> <WH8795> in a brasen <WH5178> pot <WH3627>, it shall be both scoured <WH4838> <WH8795>, and rinsed <WH7857> <WH8795> in water <WH4325>.
All the males <WH2145> among the Kohanim <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

And no sin offering <WH2403>, whereof any of the blood <WH1818> is brought <WH935> <WH8714> into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> to reconcile <WH3722> <WH8763> withal in the holy <WH6944> place, shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>: it shall be burnt <WH8313> <WH8735> in the fire <WH784>.
